title: Is specifically giving Salam only to one individual permissible?
transcript: Bismillahir Rahmanir Rahim Assalamu Alaikum Ya Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Do not specify Ya Sheikh Abdullah Ibn Mas'ud May Allah be pleased with him said among the signs of the Day of Judgement Salamul Khassa To privately select someone All of this is just Salamu Alaikum full stop I apologize Thanks for the beneficial knowledge Ya Sheikh Al Fatiha
